title: Add welcome message to homepage
body:
## Description

Add a friendly welcome message to the homepage that greets users when they first visit the site.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Welcome message appears on homepage load
- [ ] Message is personalized if user is logged in
- [ ] Message is responsive and looks good on mobile
- [ ] Message follows design system typography and spacing

## Context

**Related Issues:** None
**Tech Stack:** React, TypeScript, CSS Modules
**Constraints:** Must work without JavaScript (progressive enhancement)
**Knowledge Base References:** frontend/patterns, practices/coding-standards

## Additional Notes

This is a test issue to validate the @copilot workflow end-to-end. The implementation should be simple but demonstrate all workflow steps: branch creation, implementation, PR opening, and auto-assignment.
